result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Isaiah D Wilson

records.addlTxt: COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Joseph Thomas Domask in court.  Samuel Tufford appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case set for a final pre-trial.  Matter held via Zoom video conference and streamed through DAcast.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued REMAND TO COMMISSIONER. Court takes no action as to bail. Court vacates the jury trial on 3/9/22.

Defendant Isaiah D Wilson in court with attorney Mark Allan Dluzak.  Mario Fiumefreddo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Scheduling conference held.  Matter held via Zoom video conference and streamed through DAcast.  Defense requests Final Pretrial and Jury Trial dates. Any witness lists, special jury instructions, and motion in limine to be filed 48 hours before the final pretrial date. Court orders case adjourned for final pretrial and jury trial in Branch 29. This hearing will be streamed live via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da  Final pre-trial scheduled for February 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for March 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Isaiah D Wilson in court with attorney Mark Allan Dluzak.  Mario Fiumefreddo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Pre-trial conference held.  Matter held via Zoom video conference and streamed through DAcast. Defense counsel needs discovery and requests a scheduling conference.  Case is adjourned to Br. 29.  This hearing will be streamed live via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da  Scheduling conference scheduled for October 27, 2021 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.

Defendant Isaiah D Wilson in court with attorney Jeff Allen Schwarz.  Defendant Isaiah D Wilson in custody.  Sara Waldschmidt-DeSmet appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    All parties appeared by video conference.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kiefer, Branch 29. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.   DEFENDANT DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION IF RELEASED FROM CUSTODY. Defendant was ordered to appear for all court appearances with or without an attorney.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 20, 2021 at 08:30 am.
Per SCR 72, documents have been optically imaged and file destroyed.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Arrest Warrant received from the D.A.'s office on filing date of Criminal Complaint.
